title: Should herbal supplements be regulated?
description: Answer (1 of 3): One way or another they are regulated because otherwise we would be faced with the fact that there would be some questionable substances on the market. Nevertheless, they still exist today and therefore it is important to be very careful when choosing and using any supplements. ...
